posts.post_content:
I've been able to upgrade some of my cards recently, so looking to sell the following T206 in poor condition for $10 each delivered.  Take the lot of 16 for $150.  For the first day of the listing, I'll give priority to those requesting the greatest number of cards.  I will be listing some T206 in fair and good condition as well.  Send me a PM or an email: [url]ericksummers@yahoo.com[/url]

Chappelle, Billy (P350) 
Covaleski, Harry(P150) - pin hole
Durham, Bull (S150) 
Elberfeld, Kid [Washington Fielding] (PB) 
Geyer, Rube (P460-25)
Groom, Bob (P350) 
McIntyre, Harry [Brooklyn] (P150) - trim
Milan, Clyde (P150) 
Myers, Chief [Fielding] (P350) 
Rhodes, Charlie (P350)
Schaeffer, Germany (PB)
Schmidt, Boss [Portrait] (P350)
Shaw, Al [St. Louis] (P150)
Smith, Heinie [Buffalo] (P350)
White, Doc [Chicago Pitching] (P350)
Wiltse, Hooks [Pitching] (SC460-42) - pin hole
